file_insights.changes_summary: Added error handling using ToastProvider for user-facing feedback
key_changes: Imported useToast hook from ToastProvider component
Integrated showError and showSuccess methods into component
Replaced console.error calls with showError toasts for API failures
Added showSuccess toast confirmation for successful meeting creation
Error messages now inform users to retry on meeting load and creation failures
file_insights.impact: Enhanced user experience by providing visual feedback for async operations
file_insights.pattern_consistency: Consistent with existing toast-based error handling pattern in codebase

file_insights.changes_summary: Status update reflecting task completion and progression
key_changes: Phase changed from 'Page-Level Error Handling' to 'Extended Error Handling Coverage'
file_insights.impact: Tracking progress on automated error handling implementation across codebase

patterns_discovered.description: Using ToastProvider's showError/showSuccess methods instead of console logging for user feedback
patterns_discovered.effectiveness: Provides immediate, visible user feedback for async operations

patterns_discovered.description: Wrapping API calls in try-catch blocks and providing user-friendly error messages via toast notifications
patterns_discovered.code_example: catch (error) { showError('Failed to load meetings. Please try again.') }
patterns_discovered.consistency: Follows established pattern for handling API failures

patterns_discovered.description: Showing success toast after successful operations (meeting creation) to confirm action completion
patterns_discovered.benefit: Provides positive reinforcement and confirmation of successful operations

gotchas_discovered.description: Error messages are generic ('Please try again') without specific error details from API
gotchas_discovered.risk: Users cannot understand root cause of failures or know if retrying will help
gotchas_discovered.recommendation: Consider extracting error details from caught exceptions for more specific messaging

gotchas_discovered.description: Errors are displayed via toast but not persisted in component state
gotchas_discovered.impact: Transient feedback only; no way to display persistent error state or retry UI
gotchas_discovered.consideration: May be acceptable if toasts are sufficient, but limits error recovery options

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: Missing Error Handling in setFormData Reset
gotchas_discovered.description: Form reset happens in success path after creation but could fail silently
gotchas_discovered.risk: If setFormData fails, user won't know form reset didn't complete
gotchas_discovered.severity: Low - unlikely to fail, but lacks defensive programming

approach_outcome.objective: Add comprehensive error handling to MeetingsPage with user-facing feedback
approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Integrated ToastProvider hook to replace console logging with visual toast notifications
deliverables: Error handling for meeting list fetch operation
Error handling for meeting creation operation
User-friendly error messages via toast notifications
approach_outcome.quality_assessment: Functional error handling implemented with appropriate user feedback mechanism

recommendations.suggestion: Extract and display specific error information from API responses
recommendations.rationale: Current generic messages don't help users understand what went wrong
recommendations.implementation: Parse error object and provide context-specific messages (e.g., 'Network error', 'Server unavailable', 'Invalid data')

recommendations.suggestion: Add error state to component for persistent error display
recommendations.rationale: Transient toast notifications may disappear before user sees them
recommendations.implementation: Maintain error state variable and display error banner in addition to toast

recommendations.suggestion: Implement retry functionality in error handling
recommendations.rationale: Users may want to retry operations without manually refreshing
recommendations.implementation: Add retry button in error toast or error state component

recommendations.suggestion: Ensure loading state is reset even when errors occur
recommendations.rationale: Prevents UI from appearing stuck if error is thrown after loading started
recommendations.implementation: Verify finally block properly resets all state variables

recommendations.suggestion: Apply same error handling pattern to other API-dependent pages
recommendations.rationale: Ensures consistent error handling experience across application
recommendations.implementation: Identify other pages that need error handling and apply pattern
